transArray.content: The breakfast is rich and the hotel facilities are great. It is recommended to stay!

Hello dear, thank you for your support and affirmation of our work. Our hotel has a Chinese and Western buffet breakfast from 7 to 10 o'clock. It is very rich and delicious, as well as self-cooked snacks and various Beijing snacks. There is also free laundry in the hotel. The room and parking lot are only 800 meters away from Chaoyang Railway Station, which is very convenient. The hotel warmly looks forward to your distinguished guests coming again!
